S03n236:3: satyatyāgopaśamaprajñādibhirguṃṇātiśayairlokahitārthamudyacchamānaḥ kila bodhisattvaḥ kadācicchibīnāṃ rājā babhūva sākṣāddharma iva vinaya iva piteva prajānāmupakārapravṛttaḥ |
S03n236:5: pitreva putraḥ kṣitipena tena nananda lokadvitaye'pi lokaḥ ||1 ||
S03n236:6: samaprabhāvā svajane jane ca dharmānugā tasya hi daṇḍanītiḥ |
S03n236:7: adharmyamāvṛtya janasya mārgaṃ sopānamāleva divo babhūva ||2 ||
S03n236:9: sarvātmanā dharmapathe'bhireme tasyopamardaṃ ca parairna sehe ||3 ||
S03n236:10: atha tasya rājñaḥ pauramukhyasya duhitā śrīriva vigrahavatī sākṣādratirivāpsarasāmanyatameva parayā rūpalāvaṇyasaṃpadopetā paramadarśanīyā strīratnasaṃmatā babhūva |
S03n236:13: ataśca tasyā unmādayantītyeva bāndhavā nāma cakruḥ |
S03n236:14: atha tasyāḥ pitā rājñaḥ saṃviditaṃ kārayāmāsa-strīratnaṃ te deva viṣaye prādurbhūtam |
S03n236:15: yatastatpratigrahaṃ visarjanaṃ vā prati devaḥ pramāṇamiti |
S03n236:16: atha sa rājā strīlakṣaṇavido brāhmaṇān samādideśa-paśyantvenāṃ tatrabhavantaḥ kimasāvasmadyogyā na veti |
S03n236:17: atha tasyāḥ pitā tānbrāhmaṇān svabhavanamabhinīyonmādayantīmuvāca-bhadre svayameva brāhmaṇān pariveṣayeti |
S03n236:18: sā tatheti pratiśrutya yathākramaṃ brāhmaṇān pariveṣayitumupacakrame |
S03n236:22: yadā ca naiva śaknuvanti sma pratisaṃkhyānadhīranibhṛtamavasthātuṃ,
S03n236:24: athaiṣāṃ cakṣuṣpathādutsārya svāṃ duhitaraṃ sa gṛhapatiḥ svayameva brāhmaṇān pariveṣya visarjayāmāsa |
S03n236:25: atha teṣāṃ buddhirabhavat-kṛtyārūpamiva khalvidamatimanoharamasyā dārikāyā rūpacāturyam |
S03n236:26: yato naināṃ rājā draṣṭumapyarhati kutaḥ punaḥ patnītvaṃ gamayitum |
S03n236:27: anayā hi rūpaśobhayā niyatamasyonmāditahṛdayasya dharmārthakāryapravṛttervisrasyamānotsāhasya rājakāryakālātikramāḥ prajānāṃ hitasukhodayapathamupapīḍayantaḥ parābhavāya syuḥ |
S03n236:30: tasmādidamatra prāptakālamiti yathāprastāvamupetya rājñe nivedayāmāsuḥ-dṛṣṭāsmābhirmahārāja sā kanyakā |
S03n236:34: kuladvayasyāpi hi ninditā strī yaśo vibhūtiṃ ca tiraskaroti |
S03n236:35: nimagnacandreva niśā sameghā śobhāṃ vibhāgaṃ ca divaspṛthivyoḥ ||7 ||
S03n236:37: na ca me kulānurūpeti tasyāṃ vinivṛttābhilāṣo babhūva |
S03n236:38: anarthitāṃ tu vijñāya rājñaḥ sa gṛhapatistāṃ dārikāṃ tasyaiva rājño'mātyāyābhipāragāya prāyacchat |
S03n236:39: atha kadācitsa rājā kramāgatāṃ kaumudīṃ svasminpuravare niṣaktaśobhāṃ draṣṭumutsukamanā rathavaragataḥ siktasaṃmṛṣṭarathyāntarāpaṇamucchritavicitradhvajapatākaṃ samantataḥ puṣpopahāraśabalabhūmibhāgadhavalaṃ pravṛttanṛttagītahāsyalāsyavāditraṃ puṣpadhūpacūrṇavāsamālyāsavasnānānulepanāmodaprasṛtasurabhigandhi prasāritavividharucirapaṇyaṃ tuṣṭapuṣṭojjvalataraveṣapaurajānapadasaṃbādharājamārgaṃ puravaramanuvicaraṃstasyāmātyasya bhavanasamīpamupajagāma |
S03n236:40: athonmādayantyapalakṣaṇā kilāhamityanena rājñāvadhūteti samutpannāmarṣā rājadarśanakutūhalena nāma saṃdṛśyamānarūpaśobhā vidyudiva ghanaśikharaṃ harmyatalamavabhāsayantī vyatiṣṭhata |
S03n236:42: atha tasya rājñaḥ puravaravibhūtidarśanakutūhalaprasṛtā dṛṣṭirabhimukhasthitāyāṃ sahasaiva tasyāmapatat |
S03n236:50: iti vicārayata eva tasya rājñastaddarśanāvitṛptanayanasya sa rathastaṃ deśamativartamāno na manorathānukūlo babhūva |
S03n236:51: atha sa rājā śūnyahṛdaya iva tadgataikāgramanāḥ svabhavanamupetya manmathākṣiptadhṛtiḥ sunandaṃ sārathiṃ rahasi paryapṛcchat-
S03n236:53: kā sā tatra vyarociṣṭa vidyutsita ivāmbude ||11 ||
S03n236:55: tasya tadgṛhaṃ tasyaiva ca sā bhāryā kirīṭavatsasya duhitā unmādayantī nāmeti |
S03n236:56: tadupaśrutya sa rājā parabhāryeti vitānībhūtahṛdayaścintāstimitanayano dīrghamuṣṇamabhiniśvasya tadarpitamanāḥ śanairātmagatamuvāca-
S03n236:60: sthitaṃ tasyāṃ hi me cetaḥ sā prabhutvena tatra vā ||13 ||
S03n236:67: iti sa rājā madabalavicalitadhṛtirvyavasthāpayannapyātmānamāpāṇḍukṛśatanuḥ pradhyānaviniśvasitavijṛmbhaṇaparaḥ pravyaktamadanākāro babhūva |
S03n236:68: dhṛtyā mahatyāpi niguhyamānaḥ sa bhūpatestasya manovikāraḥ |
S03n236:70: atheṅgitākāragrahaṇanipuṇamatirabhipārago'mātyastaṃ rājño vṛttāntaṃ sakāraṇamupalabhya snehāttadatyayāśaṅko jānānaścātibalatāṃ madanasya rahasi rājānaṃ saṃviditaṃ samupetya kṛtābhyanujño vijñāpayāmāsa-
S03n236:72: māmāha nāvaiṣi nṛpasya kasmādunmādayantyāṃ hṛdayaṃ niviṣṭam ||17 ||
S03n236:77: puṇyāccyutaḥ syāmamaro na cāsmi vidyācca naḥ pāpamidaṃ jano'pi |
S03n236:78: tadviprayogācca mano jvalaṃtsvāṃ vahniḥ purā kakṣamiva kṣiṇoti ||19 ||
S03n236:80: tadyasya hetorabudhā bhajante tasyaiva hetorna budhā bhajante ||20 ||
S03n236:84: kīrtyuparodhāvakāśamapi cātra devasya na paśyāmi | kutaḥ ?
S03n236:88: svāmyarthacaryārjitayā hi tuṣṭyā nirantare cetasi ko vighātaḥ |
S03n236:89: yataḥ sukāmaṃ kuru deva kāmamalaṃ madutpīḍanaśaṅkayā te ||23 ||
S03n236:98: adṛśyamāno'pi hi pāpamācaranviṣaṃ niṣevyeva kathaṃ samṛdhnuyāt |
S03n236:99: na taṃ na paśyanti viśuddhacakṣuṣo divaukasaścaiva narāśca yoginaḥ ||26 ||
S03n236:101: śraddadhīta ka etacca yathāsau tava na priyā |
S03n236:102: tāṃ parityajya sadyo vā vighātaṃ na samāpnuyāḥ ||27 ||
S03n236:104: saputradāro dāso'haṃ svāmī tvaṃ daivataṃ ca me |
S03n236:107: mama priyā kāmada kāmameṣā tenaiva ditsāmi ca tubhyamenām |
S03n236:108: priyaṃ hi dattvā labhate paratra prakarṣaramyāṇi janaḥ priyāṇi ||29 ||
S03n236:112: ahaṃ hi śastraṃ niśitaṃ viśeyaṃ hutāśanaṃ visphuradarciṣaṃ vā |
S03n236:113: na tveva dharmādadhigamya lakṣmīṃ śakṣyāmi tatraiva punaḥ prahartuṃm ||30 ||
S03n236:114: abhipāraga uvāca-yadyenāṃ madbhāryeti devo na pratigrahītumicchatyayamahamasyāḥ sarvajanaprārthanāviruddhaveśyāvratamādiśāmi |
S03n236:122: dharmātyayo me yadi kaścidevaṃ janāpavādaḥ sukhaviplavo vā |
S03n236:124: tvattaḥ paraṃ cāhavanīyamanyaṃ loke na paśyāmi mahīmahendra |
S03n236:125: unmādayantī mama puṇyavṛddhyai tāṃ dakṣiṇāmṛtvigiva pratīccha ||33 ||
S03n236:127: ata eva tu tvāṃ viśeṣato nopekṣitumarhāmi |
S03n236:129: lokasya yo nādriyate'pavādaṃ dharmānapekṣaḥ parataḥ phalaṃ vā |
S03n236:130: jano na viśvāsamupaiti tasmindhruvaṃ ca lakṣmyāpi vivarjyate saḥ ||34 ||
S03n236:132: mā te rociṣṭa dharmasya jīvitārthe vyatikramaḥ |
S03n236:136: eko'pyanutpīḍya parānato'haṃ dharme sthitaḥ svārthadhuraṃ prapatsye ||36 ||
S03n236:137: abhipāraga uvāca-svāmyarthaṃ bhaktivaśena carato mama tāvadatra ka evādharmāvakāśaḥ syāddevasya vā dīyamānāmenāṃ pratigṛhṇataḥ |
S03n236:138: yataḥ sanaigamajānapadāḥ śibayaḥ kimatrādharma iti brūyuḥ |
S03n236:141: idaṃ tvatra cintayitavyam-sanaigamajānapadānāṃ vā śibīnāṃ tava mama vā ko'smākaṃ dharmavittama iti |
S03n236:144: trivargavidyātiśayārthatattvaṃ tvayi sthitaṃ deva bṛhaspatau ca | 37 ||
S03n236:145: rājovāca-tena hi na māmatra pratārayitumarhasi | kutaḥ?
S03n236:146: narādhipānāṃ cariteṣvadhīnaṃ lokasya yasmādahitaṃ hitaṃ ca |
S03n236:147: bhaktiṃ prajānāmanucintya tasmātkīrtikṣame satpatha eva raṃsye ||38 ||
S03n236:148: jihmaṃ śubhaṃ vā vṛṣabhapracāraṃ gāvo'nugā yadvadanuprayānti |
S03n236:153: iti prajānāṃ hitamīkṣamāṇaḥ svaṃ caiva dharmaṃ vimalaṃ yaśaśca |
S03n236:154: necchāmi cittasya vaśena gantumahaṃ hi netā vṛṣavatprajānām ||41 ||
S03n236:155: athābhipārago'mātyastena rājño'vasthānena prasāditamanāḥ praṇamya rājānaṃ prāñjalirityuvāca-
S03n236:162: tadevaṃ tīvraduḥkhāturāṇāmapi satāṃ nīcamārganiṣpraṇayatā bhavati svadhairyāvaṣṭambhāt svabhyastadharmasaṃjñatvācceti dhairyadharmābhyāse ca yogaḥ kārya iti |
